title: Episode 284 w/ Shyheim
itunes:title: Episode 284 w/ Shyheim
description:
N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode, we chop it up with Shyheim!

Shyheim aka The Rugged Child signed his first record deal at the age of 13!Â 

The Wu-Tang Affiliate joins us and shares his journey. Shyheim, shares stories of performing with 2Pac, Digital Underground, Biggie, recording music with Big L and more.

Shyheim shares how he started rolling with Big Daddy Kane, the challenges he faced growing up as a child star, his evolution as a man and much much more!

Lots of great stories that you donâ€™t want to miss!
